roleset.name: develop in conjuction with another developer or project

role.descr: other thing developed at the same time

example.name: co-develop-v: two developers
example.text: The British should know, they co-developed it with the French.

example.name: codevelopment-n
example.text: A unique feature of REG1 is its codevelopment with a targeted antidote that is designed to rapidly reverse its pharmacological activity.
example.arg: with a targeted antidote that is designed to rapidly reverse its pharmacological activity.

roleset.note: CODEVELOP-V, CODEVELOPMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia
